answers.answer: ...could be signs of preclampsia?? How far along are you?!?!
I'm 30 weeks will b 31 Thursdays nov 8 th
I just have that gut feeling something is not right and idk what to do

How elevated was your BP? Also did they order a 24 hour urine test? If they didnt I would highly recomend you ask your Dr about it. When a pregnant woman shows signs of preeclampsia and has protein in her urine its cause for a 24 hr urine. You pick up a container from them or a lab. And collect all of your urine for 24 hours and when you return it they draw your blood.

I left a urine sample and they sent that to the lab to be concentrated but that's really all they told me I called this morning and the nurse I talk to told me if they need anything or wanted me to come in they would call and that I don't need to b worried

I had preeclampsia with my first. The Dr made me lay on my left side to get oxygen to my baby. I was in hospital for a whole month before I had my son. They had to induce labor early (almost a month early). I gained 50 lbs of fluids in my body.My advice is to follow Dr orders. My Dr had to bring in a specialist to talk to me about how serious the matter was cause I didn't think it was such a big deal and hated being on my left side 24 7 for a month.If you get put on bed rest use it as a time to bond. Talk and read to your baby.Stay calm and try not to be stressed it will only cause more problems. Take control now you may avoid complications.Keep us posted....

I had preeclampsia with my first. The Dr made me lay on my left side to get oxygen to my baby. I was in hospital for a whole month before I had my son. My dr really has not said if I have preeclampsia or not but they r wanting me to come in if I start filling any worse.... I am however supposed to start physical therapy here soon for my siatica nerve on my left side for the remainder of my pregnancy so it's hard to lay on my left side since it hurts so bad but I try to stay on my back or right side... Hopefully this is nothing and it will just pass even though I don't feel like myself at all.....

Sorry, dropped my phone. Well, try and stay positive. If your blood pressure continues to be high and you don't feel like you're getting proper care, go to a different hospital. Even with preclampsia there isn't much they can do, you'd likely be induced and have more frequent appointments for monitoring. Hang in there, you're near the end and hopefully soon you'll have your beautiful baby, no nerve pain and lower blood pressure! ;-)

question: Ok moms I'm so worried right now I went in for a dr app today and my blood pressure was high they had me just sit for a little bit and it went back down but then they were look at my urine and it was +1 protein and with me getting dizzy often they say its not good... They already have me taking it easy since my sciatic never is bothering me
title: Worried
